channel.title: Comments on: Monday Go Meditation: Game 37

item.title: By: Ben
item.dc:creator: Ben
item.description: You're welcome! I'm glad that they've been of some help. Haha. It certainly was an eye opening experience for me to go back to my old games. =)
item.content:encoded: You’re welcome! I’m glad that they’ve been of some help. Haha. It certainly was an eye opening experience for me to go back to my old games. =)

item.title: By: Zoltan Halasz
item.dc:creator: Zoltan Halasz
item.description: Wow, thanks for sharing this game, thit is a nice koan-like experience about the mistakes of myself. :)
